name: Gravity by Culture // Culture by Gravity
name_original: Gravity by Culture // Culture by Gravity
description:
A relaxing space based object collecting game, inspired by Heaven Will Be Mine. You are a small artist, floating alone in space, dwarfed by the impossibly imposing might of the mainstream industry. You are a small artist, you are not floating alone. Draw others towards you until your community is as large and beautiful as any cultural machine.

CONTROLS:

- W/S to speed up or slow down

- A/D tilt your current orbit

- Scroll wheel or Z/X to zoom in/out

- Hold the right mouse button to spin the camera

- Press the left mouse button to pull an object towards you

     - If the crosshair is green, you may pick them up

     - If the crosshair is red, the object is too far away

     - If the crosshair is yellow, the other object is too large, get some others first!

CREDITS:

- This project originated as a way to teach myself shader graph, as such many of the shaders are pulled from the examples of the amazing Keijiro Takahashi (@_kzr)

- Music is Holidat by Blue Dot Sessions (http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Blue_Dot_Sessions/)

If you run into any problems or just want some more of this good good content, check out my twitter @Wormsnacks
